attributes.action: Make all female sanitary products free
attributes.additional_details: Introduce legislation that ensures every woman in the United Kingdom has access to free sanitary products.
attributes.background: I think something that is a act of nature for every single woman , they should have the right to free sanitary products , you can get free conception products from the doctors so why not the same for sanitary products.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make sanitary products freely available to all women
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584711
